attributes.action: exempt motorcycles and scooters (Two Wheeled Motor Vehicles) from the proposals on road pricing and congestion charging set out the draft Local Government Bill
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The advantages of using two wheels have been completely overlooked in the debate over road pricing, this despite the motorcycle and scooter's advantage in reducing congestion and emissions, occupying less road and parking space and bringing social inclusion to those poorly served by public transport. 
As such, subjecting riders of motorcycles and scooters to charges intended to reduce congestion is counterproductive.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
